tasks.prompt:
Perform a comprehensive code review for Strike 1: Build Verification

Review Checklist:
1. Run clean build from scratch
2. Verify zero build errors
3. Check all dependencies installed
4. Ensure build artifacts generated

Provide a detailed review report with:
- Clear PASS/FAIL status for each criterion
- Specific issues found with file locations
- Remediation steps if review fails
- Overall recommendation

If the review fails, create specific tasks to address each issue found.
Be thorough but fair - focus on objective criteria.

tasks.title: Fix TaskManager performance test NaN duration calculation
tasks.description: Fix failing test in TaskManager test suite where duration calculation returns NaN instead of a number, causing the performance test to fail. The test expects duration < 100ms but receives NaN.
success_criteria: TaskManager performance test calculates valid numeric duration
Test expects duration < 100ms and passes with valid number
Large task array processing performance test passes consistently
No NaN values in test output

tasks.title: Fix integrity validation backup restoration test expecting >0 successes
tasks.description: Fix failing backup restoration test that expects at least one successful restoration but receives 0 successes. The test needs to handle protection system blocking restoration tests or adjust expectations for test environment behavior.
success_criteria: Test properly handles protection system behavior
Either successful restorations occur or test expectations adjusted for protection blocking
No test failures due to 0 successful restorations

tasks.title: Prevent JSON contamination during test execution causing build failures
tasks.description: Fix the root cause of JSON contamination that occurs during test execution, contaminating node_modules/exit/lib/exit.js with JSON data that causes build failures. The contamination fix script works but contamination re-occurs during testing.
success_criteria: Build completes successfully without contamination errors
Tests run without contaminating node_modules files
No JSON data written to JavaScript files during test execution
Exit.js file maintains valid JavaScript content throughout build process
